doc.text: hello, i have some question to ask regarding the lte support on the iphone5. i bought an iphone5 from apple store in paris, but im currently living in malaysia, just a neighbouring country of singapore. the problem is that my lte isn't functioning..so my question is that, is there a possibility that my lte will not function because i bought it in paris and used it in malaysia, or is it my device is spoilt?
i just notice that my phone turn the light on when i press volume button. all your iphone5 the same as mine or not, please reply to let me know clearly, cz m worry it will error with volume button.
rip iphone 5!

iphone 5 is definitely an excellent phone, but the for ones whom like to 'personalize' and have fun with the system of their units it is certainly not preferable. so it's up to which side are you in. and despite the solid built, imho, it's too costly and lack of value.
it is really superb phone. it can be bought without hesitation.
when wil 5c comes to africa ?
do not buy iphone 5. it has been discontinued. wait for iphone 5s for release date.
very late. ios is looking blah
i have an i phone5 and the battery dies on six hours /standby. i have 3 days to return it. hmmm
iphone 5 has been discontinued as apple recently launched iphone 5s, iphone 5c.
awesome
i have the one but its battery does not work this long.
superb!!
the best, can't wait for the ios 7 gm!

does anyone have this problem with an iphone 5? you are in the middle of a call and all of the sudden, the call fails, then the 'end call' hangs for a good two minutes before you can actually make another call. 02 blamed iphone and apple blamed 02. three sim cards and two phones later, there is no difference.

i do agree with u. i have used nokia n73. n82, n79 and at present e52. all of these were classic phones. today these have just become some sweet memories, nokia fans will never forgive nokia for their brutal killing.
waiting for i phone 6
iphone is but battery back up is not good
1 attached battery, not removal 2 external memory slot not available

i have been using iphone for the first time in my life for nearly a year now, used ltc before for a few years, it was boring, keep on hang. honestly my iphone 5 does not hang at all, that is suprisingly amazing to me, functions really well. i bought the black color one but no major scratch (yet, i am a careful user). the speed is superbly smooth going like a silk and i need to mention this again, it does not hang! i am really happy with that. i advise if u never use an iphone before and have been using other products, i can tell you that its well worth it, n i am a very satisfied customer. btw, it look stunning. enhances my good looks. haha
iphone 5 is the best

i bought an iphone 5 last month i don't see anything impressive about the phone especially when you compare it with samsung galaxy s4,really s4 is giving it a hiding.first it doesn't memory card slot,no removable battery,even to put the sim card in the phone its a mission because u'll need the special tool to do that.to me only the looks of it is the that is attractive.

quick comparison. apple i5 of this stat 1gbram dual dual-core 1.3 ghz vs android galaxy s4 of 1gbram dual-core 1.3 ghz then play this game(n.o.v.a or batman)you know the result already without even giving it a try.

iphone 5 has 2 disadvantages in my opinion: a)screen size, but you know that before you bought it. it has excellent performance on browsing but you cant enjoy at all because of the screen size. b)if you buy the black one as i do, use a case or every minute you will find new scratches on your phone coating. after some days of headache because of scratches i bought that flip case and now i am ok! main advantages: quality, performance, ios 7.

my unit has a defective screen,dead pixels with black tiny stripes that took more than 70% of the screen, purchased it only last july 2013 :(. i have never dropped the phone or placed it in a wet surface. been using it under normal condition. most of the time it stays in my bag since cellphones are not allowed inside my office. i thought this is the most durable phone today.
i love iphone 5
just buy samsung galaxy s4! better in every aspect

remember why note 3 best of world.... 1....world 1st mobile to capture 4k video... 2......world 1st mobile to use usb 3.0.... 3......64 gb internal memory and 64 gb microw sd slot(128gb) 4......s-pen 5.....first true octa core(update octa core...use 8 core at same time) 6.....world 1st mobile to come 3 gb ram.... 7.....android 4.3(letest) 8.....better software(eye tracking,ir port,smart pause,group play,s voice,multi window,air view...true rich contrast for full hd video viewing...just try the audio effects on both built in speakers & head set...amazing fhd motion games in a wide screen....and a lot lot lot....just try it ... i disposed my zzzzz for a half price...samsung innovating others following...like z ultra... i phone users u will get these spec....@ 20000 $ after 3 years....

i used to use a nokia 6700 and 6720 and was very happy with that compared to the iphone. nokia should have focused on these phones and the pricing. symbian was a good os. ms is going to kill nokia ! too bad. i still think my old nokia phones are much better than all this hype created by smart phones
